sections.description:
WordPress Embedded Post Plugin

A powerful WordPress plugin that automatically sends rich embedded messages to Discord channels when your posts are published. Now also sends new comments as embeds to Discord.

Features:

  • Automated Discord Notifications: Send embed messages when posts are published.
  • Category-Based Triggers: Only notify for specific post categories.
  • Dynamic Placeholders: Customize messages with post-specific data.
  • Multiple Integration Options: Supports both Discord bots and webhooks.
  • Rich Embeds: Create beautiful, formatted Discord messages.
  • Customizable Components: Buttons, fields, and more.
  • Filter to Markdown: Filter HTML tags and convert to Markdown.

How It Works:

The plugin hooks into three types of WordPress actions:

  1. transition_post_status: Executes when the post status changes.
  2. ${old_status}_to_${new_status}: Executes for specific status changes (e.g., draft_to_publish).
  3. save_post: Executes when a post is saved or published. Recommended.

Process:

  1. Checks if the post belongs to a monitored category.
  2. Constructs a rich embed message using your templates.
  3. Sends the message to your specified Discord channel.
  4. Supports both bot and webhook integration.

Installation:

  1. Download the latest version from the Releases page.
  2. In WordPress Admin, go to Plugins â†’ Add New.
  3. Click "Upload Plugin" and select the ZIP file.
  4. Activate the plugin.

Configuration:

Bot Setup:

  • Create a Discord application and add a bot.
  • Copy the bot token and invite the bot to your server.
  • Note your channel ID and enter the details in the plugin settings.

Webhook Setup:

  • Create a new webhook in your Discord channel.
  • Customize and copy the webhook URL, then paste it in the plugin settings.

Tag Setup:

  • Send a tag message in Discord, copy the ID, and use it in plugin settings.

Post Section Setup:

  • Fill required fields (Bot Token/Webhook URL), customize embedded style, and configure categories.

Comment Section Setup:

  • Select comment service (WordPress, Wpdiscuz, Disqus), insert webhook/Bot Token and channel ID.

Placeholder System:

Customize embeds using placeholders in every section:

  • Main message, embed author/title/description, field names/values, button labels, footer text.

Default Placeholders include:

  • author, post_date, post_title, thumbnail_url, permalink, post_name, post_content, post_status, post_type, post_category, timestamp, default_tag, etc.

Advanced Usage:

Examples for announcements, product alerts, and more provided using template variables.
